Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to housing accommodations in certain buildings where seventy-five percent of the total residents are fifty-five or older
Summary: Relates to regulations pertaining to housing accommodations in buildings with six or more dwelling units where seventy-five percent of the total residents are fifty-five or older.
LawCode: Amd §§5 & 10, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, in relation to housing accommodations in certain buildings where seventy-five percent of the total residents are fifty-five or older
